department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The current tender is invited for the Contract to Contractor Village Phase 2. The current tender amounted to $45 million. KCA Deutag Drilling Canada and FKF Riche Greens UD LP was awarded the Contract described in this Tender.
full_summary:
**Title:** Greater Toronto Area Contractor Village Phase 2

**Reference Number:** WS4334218628-Doc4414933259

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Solicitation Number:** WS4334218628

**Publication Date:** January 26, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** February 27, 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Time

**Amendment Date:** February 14, 2024

**Expected Contract Start Date:** February 5, 2024

**Expected Contract End Date:** December 31, 2030

**Tender Status:** Expired

**UNSPSC Codes:**

* 72100000: Building and facility maintenance and repair services
* 72120000: Nonresidential building construction services

**Procurement Category:** Construction Services (CNST)

**Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:** High Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Trade Agreements:** The contracting authority acknowledges the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**

* Canada
* Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* Toronto
* World

**Regions of Delivery:**

* Canada
* Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* Toronto
* World

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Ambreen Dhillon, (she/her), Email: [ambreen.dhillon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ambreen.dhillon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Description:**

This is the second phase of a two-phase process to acquire the services of a contractor for the Greater Toronto Area Contractor Village. The successful bidder will be required to provide building and facility maintenance and repair services and nonres
